oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ʻIṭr al-akwān bi-mawlid Sayyid Walad ʻAdnān / taʼlīf al-Sayyid Ṣiddīq tilmīdh al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Sammān al-Madanī : manuscript, 1900
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Madanī, Ṣiddīq.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 13 lines per page, in black and red, rubricated in red, and framed within double black and golden lines. First leaf illuminated.
According to colophon (f. 11v), copy completed on 22 Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1318 AH [July 19, 1900 AD].
MS Arab 316. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Muḥammad--Prophet---632
Mawlid al-Nabī
